tools/varStats.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Report variable statistics on a dataset.

Source
/home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/varStats.c,v
Revision
1.24
Date
2006/11/07 23:49:03

Description: Usage: varStats [options] dataset [var_name]

Reports variable statistics. If a variable name is given, it reports the stats for only that variable, otherwise it reports stats for all variables.

Modifications:

  • 04/20/04 WSK, created.

Definition in file varStats.c.

#include <string.h>
#include "fc.h"

00111   // handle arguments

00117     printf("   -h         : print this help message\n");

00127   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {

00132       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;

00138       if (i+1 < argc) {

00140         doOnlyOne = 1;
00141         var_name = argv[i];

00144   }
00145   if (!file_name)
00146     goto usage;
00147     
00148   
00149   // init library and load dataset 
00150   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00151   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00152   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00153   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00154   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00155   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", file_name);
00156 
00157   // Get number of meshes and mesh names
00158   rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00159   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00160 
00161   // header
00162   printf("Variable statistics summary for dataset '%s'\n", file_name);
00163   fflush(NULL);
00164   if (numMesh < 0) {
00165     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00166     fflush(NULL);
00167     exit(0);
00168   }
00169   else {
00170     printf("%d meshes\n", numMesh);
00171     fflush(NULL);
00172   }
00173 
00174   // loop over meshes
00175   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00176 
00177     fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_name);
00178 
00179     //------- do basic vars -----------------
00180 
00181     // get var names
00182     if (doOnlyOne) {
00183       numVar = 1;
00184       vars = malloc(sizeof(FC_Variable));
00185       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i],
00186                               var_name,
00187                               &vars[0]);
00188       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00189       if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(vars[0], FC_NULL_VARIABLE)){
00190      fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00191                     var_name);
00192      numVar = 0;
00193       }
00194     }
00195     else {
00196       rc = fc_getVariables(meshes[i], &numVar, &vars);
00197       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00198     }
00199 
00200     // do var statistics
00201     for (j = 0; j < numVar; j++) {
00202       // print var info
00203       printf("\n");
00204       fflush(NULL);
00205       sprintf(message, "Var %d (on Mesh %d: '%s')", j, i, mesh_name);
00206       fc_printVariable(vars[j], message, 0);
00207       
00208       // Handle based on mathtype
00209       rc = fc_getVariableInfo(vars[j], NULL, NULL, NULL, &mathtype, NULL);
00210       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00211 
00212       // print stats
00213       if (mathtype == FC_MT_UNKNOWN) {
00214         printf("%sCan't do statistics for variables with mathtype %s\n",
00215                INDENT_STR, fc_getMathTypeText(mathtype));
00216         fflush(NULL);
00217       }
00218       else if (mathtype == FC_MT_SCALAR)
00219         get_and_print_stats(vars[j], "Data Statistics:", INDENT_STR);
00220       else {
00221         FC_Variable magnitude, *components;
00222         printf("%sData Statistics:\n", INDENT_STR);
00223         fflush(NULL);
00224         if (mathtype == FC_MT_VECTOR) {
00225           rc = fc_createMagnitudeVariable(vars[j], "temp", &magnitude);
00226           fc_exitIfError(rc);
00227           get_and_print_stats(magnitude, "Magnitude of Vector:",
00228                               INDENT_STR INDENT_STR);
00229           fc_deleteVariable(magnitude);
00230         }
00231         rc = fc_createComponentVariables(vars[j], &numComp, &components);
00232         fc_exitIfError(rc);
00233         for (k = 0; k < numComp; k++) { 
00234           sprintf(message, "Component %d:", k);
00235           get_and_print_stats(components[k], message, INDENT_STR INDENT_STR);
00236           fc_deleteVariable(components[k]);
00237         }
00238         free(components);
00239       }
00240 
00241       // cleanup
00242       fc_deleteVariable(vars[j]);
00243     }
00244     
00245     // cleanup 
00246     free(vars);
00247     
00248     //------- do sequence vars -----------------
00249 
00250     // get var names
00251     if (doOnlyOne) {

00254       seqVars = malloc(sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00255 
00256       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i],
00257                                  var_name,
00258                                  &numStepPerVar[0],
00259                                  &seqVars[0]);
00260       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00261       if (!seqVars[0]){
00262      fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00263                     var_name);
00264         numSeqVar = 0;
00265      numStepPerVar = 0;
00266       }
00267     } else {
00268       rc = fc_getSeqVariables(meshes[i], &numSeqVar,&numStepPerVar,
00269                               &seqVars);
00270       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00271     }
00272 
00273     // do var statistics
00274     for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) {
00275       // FIX? get sequence coords to print with stat data?
00276

00280       sprintf(message, "SeqVar %d (on Mesh %d: '%s')", j, i, mesh_name);
00281       fc_printVariable(seqVars[j][0], message, 0);
00282       
00283       // Handle based on mathtype
00284       rc = fc_getVariableInfo(seqVars[j][0], NULL, NULL, NULL, &mathtype, 
00285                               NULL);
00286       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00287       if (mathtype == FC_MT_UNKNOWN) {
00288         printf("%sCan't do statistics for variables with mathtype %s\n",
00289                INDENT_STR, fc_getMathTypeText(mathtype));
00290         fflush(NULL);
00291       }
00292       
00293       // print statistics for each step
00294       for (k = 0; k < numStepPerVar[j]; k++) {
00295         if (mathtype == FC_MT_SCALAR) {
00296           sprintf(message, "Data Statistics for Step %d:", k);
00297           get_and_print_stats(seqVars[j][k], message, INDENT_STR);
00298         }
00299         else {
00300           FC_Variable magnitude, *components;
00301           printf("%sData Statistics for Step %d\n", INDENT_STR, k);
00302           fflush(NULL);
00303           if (mathtype == FC_MT_VECTOR) {
00304             rc = fc_createMagnitudeVariable(seqVars[j][k], "temp", &magnitude);
00305             fc_exitIfError(rc);
00306             sprintf(message, "Magnitude of Vector:");
00307             get_and_print_stats(magnitude, message, INDENT_STR INDENT_STR);
00308             fc_deleteVariable(magnitude);
00309           }
00310           rc = fc_createComponentVariables(seqVars[j][k], &numComp, &components);
00311           fc_exitIfError(rc);
00312           for (m = 0; m < numComp; m++) {
00313             sprintf(message, "Component %d:", m);
00314             get_and_print_stats(components[m], message, INDENT_STR INDENT_STR);
00315             fc_deleteVariable(components[m]);
00316           }
00317           free(components);
00318         }
00319       }
00320       
00321       // cleanup
00322       fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStepPerVar[j], seqVars[j]);
00323       free(seqVars[j]);
00324     }
00325     
00326     // cleanup
00327     free(numStepPerVar);
00328     free(seqVars);
00329     
00330     // extra reporting
00331     if (doOnlyOne && numVar == 0 && numSeqVar == 0) {
00332       printf("Variable '%s' not found on Mesh '%s'\n", var_name, 
00333              mesh_name);
00334       fflush(NULL);
00335     }
00336     
00337     // delete mesh
00338     fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00339     free(mesh_name);
00340   }
00341   free(meshes);
00342     
00343   // shut down
00344   fc_deleteDataset(ds);
00345   fc_finalLibrary();
00346 
00347   exit(0);
00348 }
